title: Always peek before clicking
detail: When using browser automation, always call peek() before the first action on a new page to understand the UI structure.

title: Checkboxes require explicit clicks
detail: Checkboxes are click actions, not typing actions. Every checkbox must be explicitly clicked even if it appears checked visually.

title: REST PUT vs PATCH semantics
detail: PUT replaces the entire resource; PATCH applies partial updates. Use PATCH for incremental changes to avoid overwriting unmodified fields.

title: SQLite WAL mode performance
detail: Enabling WAL mode (Write-Ahead Logging) improves concurrent read performance by 2-3x and eliminates most lock contention.

title: IPv6 localhost resolution issue
detail: When fetch() fails with 'connection refused' on localhost:XXXX but curl works, check if the service binds only IPv4 (127.0.0.1) while Node.js resolves localhost to IPv6 (::1) first. Use explicit 127.0.0.1 instead of localhost.
